message.content: {"id": "2529", "title": "Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)", "description": "Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.", "OB": "When selecting the P1 and P2 projects, I notice that the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project option is not available.", "EB": "The expected behavior is that either both Open Project and Close Project options should be available or neither of them should be enabled.", "SR": "Ensure that the Open/Close Project options are consistently available based on the selected projects."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '2529', 'title': 'Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)', 'description': 'Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now selectboth P1 and P2. ', 'OB': 'Notice the Open Project menu item is available butthe Close Project is not. ', 'EB': 'Either both should be available or neitherone should be enabled.NOTES: ', 'SR': ''}
